snippet: I had a great experience at Pinnacle Group of Tutions, they give personal attention to each of the students and the teachers teach the topics in very detail which helped me greatly in my board and entrance exams. Their weekly tests in the same pattern as the entrance exams gave me a very good assessment which ultimately gave me a major boost in my MHT CET Result. It is a great choice as classes for students.

Quality of teaching is Amazing,
And has good 1 to 1 attention as well.
Class atmosphere is good,
And tests are held regularly, for checking our progress.

Very polite and qualified teachers , Had a great experience there for PCM 12th grade.
Excellent teaching.

Teachers are very friendly and helpful
They will make sure ur learn stuff in a fun way and not a boring method

Can easily recommend the Classes to anyone who wants a real proper 1 to 1 interaction with the teachers. The teachers teach really well and make the study material easy to understand. Its been years since I studied under their guidance and not once did I ever regret joining the class.
The teachers Are friendly, helpful, communicative and cheerful.

Pinnacle is one of the best coaching institute. I have been studying here for 2 years and my experience is great. The teachers are skilled and are always ready to help. There is one to one interaction. Would highly recommend it.

Studying here for almost 2 years and had a great experience. Having a small groups of students makes absolute one n one interaction. Teachers are very helpful and always there if there is any difficulties.
My experience in pinnacle was great . It has friendly environment and one to one interaction with the teachers. Best teachers and faculty. Would highly recommend this class.

Pinnacle is the one the best tution in Airoli for JEE and 11th and 12th. Teachers are well experienced and each teacher have the excellence in teaching field. Doubts of students get clear with excellent clearity. Not only in studies but also they help students in their school and college life problems.

I studied here for 11-12th class and prepared for NEET exam.
Classes are mostly in small groups so there is absolutely one to one interaction.
Repeated queries/doubts are solved without any question.
Test and question paper solving is also regular.
Teachers are experienced and the result is excellent.
I would 100% recommend this class for students.
